product_name: Potable Aqua Chlorine Dioxide Tablets - Package of 30
long_description: Purifying water couldn't be easier! Simply drop a Potable Aqua chlorine dioxide tablet from this packet of 30 into a quart of water and let it go to work. Features the same proven technology used in municipal water supplies; effective against viruses, bacteria, Giardia and. Requires a 4 hr. treatment time to kill contaminants. Each tablet is individually wrapped and sealed. Unopened Potable Aqua tablets that are stored at temperatures between 60 and 86degF should remain effective up to 4 years. Exposure to heat, humidity, moisture and air will reduce the effectiveness of the tablets.
short_description: Purifying water couldn't be easier! Simply drop a Potable Aqua chlorine dioxide tablet from this packet of 30 into a quart of water and let it go to work.
